params._account: Address of the account to give the minter role to.

getAddressByMinter(uint256).details: Different minter id's can map to the same address.

params._minter: The index of the minter account.

returns._0: Address of the minter for the given minter index in the minterToAddress storage.

params._address: The address of the minter account.

returns._0: Index of the minter for a given address.

initializeRoles(address).details: Should be called right after deploying the contract. _owner will become minter, and role admin.

params._owner: Address of the account that should own the contract.

params._account: Address of the account to check the minter role for.

returns._0: if the given address bears the minter role.

params._account: Address of the account to check the minter role admin account for.

returns._0: if the given address is the minter role admin.

params._account: Address of the account to revoke the minter role for.

upgradeAddress(address,address).details: Different minter id's can map to the same address.

params._newAddress: The new address of the minter.
params._oldAddress: The current address of the minter.

getAddressByMinter(uint256).notice: Upgrades an existing minter address to a new minter address, can only be called by the minter itself.

upgradeAddress(address,address).notice: Upgrades an existing minter address to a new minter address, can only be called by the minter itself.
